learning_outcomes.description: Demonstrate advanced communication skills in the language at B2.2 level.
Exhibit a proficient level of Spanish language grammar appropriate to B2.2 in writings, reviews, reflections and discussions.
Comprehend written texts and authentic real-world sources material in Spanish at B2.2 level.
Maintain a conversation/debate and interaction in Spanish at B2.2 level.
Identify and appreciate the different aspects that compose the culture, history and society of the Spanish speaking world.

assessments.category: Paper/ Report/ Annotation, Essay/ Critique, Tutorial/ Problem Set
assessments.task_description:
The completion of the exercises at the end of each Unidad will assist in the consolidation of the teaching material learnt in class and will facilitate the progressive nature of learning a language. This assessment puts into practice the language learning skills of listening, comprehension, reading and writing.

Students will also be able to identify any area that needs attention and find adequate help from lecturers in class and during consultation hours.

Each task consists of listening to tracks found in the online platform 'Campus Difusión' that accompanies Aula Internacional Plus 5 and two compositions based on the content of each Unidad or assigned films. Students are required to use their own words when answering to the questions.

STATEMENT ON GENERATIVE AI & MT

This assessment task evaluates students' abilities, skills and knowledge without the aid of generative Artificial Intelligence (AI) or Machine Translation (MT). Students are advised that the use of AI or MT technologies to develop responses is strictly prohibited and may constitute student misconduct under the Student Code of Conduct.
assessments.submission_guidelines: Turnitin on course Blackboard, section 'Assessment' by 17:00 due date. Please use Word and double space for your worksheet. You can submit before the due date.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.late_submission: A penalty of 10% of the maximum possible mark will be deducted per 24 hours from time submission is due for up to 7 days. After 7 days, you will receive a mark of 0.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.

assessments.due_date:

assessments.task_description:
Written task covering Unidades 1, 2 and 3 of Aula Internacional 5 Plus B2.2.

This is a Blackboard test that includes short answer questions, fill in multiple blanks questions and a short essay.

Completion time: 60 minutes.

STATEMENT ON GENERATIVE AI & MT

This assessment task evaluates students' abilities, skills and knowledge without the aid of generative Artificial Intelligence (AI) or Machine Translation (MT). Students are advised that the use of AI or MT technologies to develop responses is strictly prohibited and may constitute student misconduct under the Student Code of Conduct.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.late_submission: A penalty of 10% of the maximum possible mark will be deducted per 24 hours from time submission is due for up to 7 days. After 7 days, you will receive a mark of 0.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.

assessments.task_description:
Group presentation: 3 students per group. Marking is individual.

Students have to present to the rest of the class their finding about a Unesco World Heritage Site or Memory of the World from the Spanish speaking world. Students have to work in groups of three. The presentation has to cover the description of the Masterpiece, the reasons for its listing as a World Heritage and the proposal of an Australian (or from some other country) site that would fit in the UNESCO criteria. Each student will present a 5 minute talk without reading it from a pre-written script. Students can use Power Point to enhance their presentation.

STATEMENT ON GENERATIVE AI & MT

This assessment task is to be completed in-person. The use of generative Artificial Intelligence (AI) or Machine Translation (MT) tools will not be permitted. Any attempted use of AI or MT may constitute student misconduct under the Student Code of Conduct.

assessments.late_submission: You will receive a mark of 0 if this assessment is submitted late.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.

assessments.task_description:
Written exam covering Unidades 4, 5 and 6 (Aula internacional 5 Plus B2.2). This is one in a series of tasks covering 2 language skills (reading, writing). Duration: 60 minutes. In person.

STATEMENT ON GENERATIVE AI & MT
